title: UAE Tour: Tobias Foss has a Monster 68-Tooth Chainring. He Explains Why.
content:
'I never used anything bigger than about a 60 before': Former world TT champion details thinking behind wild gearing for stage 2 test.

Read the full article at UAE Tour: Tobias Foss has a Monster 68-Tooth Chainring. He Explains Why. on Velo.
author: sstokes
